metadata.name: Saving Love
metadata.description:
take my love and pass it on  
somewhere someone needs it  
help them feel the breaking dawn  
if only for a bit

they take their love and pass again  
to someone feeling down  
to let them know they have a friend  
and help their love be found

but don't forget to save a piece  
of love for you okay?  
let it lead you like the breeze  
a breath of life each day
